InstructionData.Title: SDB Trader Console
InstructionData.Author: Saddamo De Beers
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias DialHorizontal d0​ alias DialVertical d1​ ​ alias LedHorizontal d3​ alias LedVertical d4​ ​ alias Klaxon d2​ alias SateliteDish d5​ ​ s d2 Mode 7 s d2 Volume 25
start:​ l r11 d5 SignalStrength​ mul r11 r11 100 ​ l r0 d0 Setting​ l r1 d1 Setting​ ​ mul r0 r0 10​ mul r1 r1 10​ ​ s d5 Horizontal r0​ s d5 Vertical r1​ ​ l r5 d5 Horizontal​ l r6 d5 Vertical​ ​ round r5 r5​ round r6 r6​ ​ s d3 Setting r5​ s d4 Setting r6​ ​ sge r10 r11 95 s d2 Mode r10
yield​ ​ j start
